title: This latest freaky beauty trend involves a condom - Times of India
text:
If you're one of those beauty junkies, you ought to have a beauty blenderâ€”an egg shape sponge used to blend concealer, foundation, etc. Beauty blender always made contouring or any sorts of blending fun. While the pink sponge had many fans, a new crop of blending product also made many rounds of internetâ€”the silicon pad. This silicon pad may look like a breast implant; but it promises zero product absorption, unlike the sponge ones. Which means that your expensive foundation, concealers won't be wasted. 

But if you're still making up your mind to buy this silicon blender, the new hack will save you from the dilemma. Now, beauty vloggers are using beauty blenders covered with condoms minus lubrication to blend their make-up. Bonus: You can cover your old pointed pink blenders with a condom. 

Still not convinced? This hack will give you the silicon pad benefits on your regular ones. The condom covered blenders can reach the tiny spots, like under eyes, nose, etc. But that's not it; it will also give you a smooth texture and zero product absorption. Well, this freaky hack might come handy to all the beauty junkies. 

All you need to do is a take a condom, wash off any lubrication, tie it on the end and start blending! It all started when International blogger Laila Tahri posted a video on her Instagram. Watch the condom hack here
